view_as_info: You are currently seeing what users with this role are seeing.
copy_confirm_message: {1} Are you sure you want to copy this workspace? | [2,Inf[ Are you sure you want to copy these %count% workspaces?
archive_confirm_message: {1} Are you sure you want to archive this workspace? | [2,Inf[ Are you sure you want to archive these %count% workspaces?
delete_confirm_message: {1} Are you sure you want to delete this workspace? | [2,Inf[ Are you sure you want to delete these %count% workspaces?

self_register_confirm_message: {1} Are you sure you want to subscribe to this workspace ?|[2,Inf[ Are you sure you want to subscribe to these %count% workspaces ?
workspace_personal: This workspace is a personal workspace.
not_found_desc: We are sorry, we could not find your workspace. It is possible that it does not exist (or no longer) or that the URL used is incorrect.

restricted_workspace.access_message: You can not access this workspace because all access conditions are not met.
restricted_workspace.authorized_ip: You are using an authorized work station.
restricted_workspace.authorized_ip_required: Access must be done from an authorized work station.
restricted_workspace.can_access: You are registered to this workspace.
restricted_workspace.cannot_access: You are not registered to this workspace.
restricted_workspace.contact_manager: Please contact a manager %manager_email% if you think you should have access to this workspace.
restricted_workspace.ended: The workspace is not available anymore.
restricted_workspace.enter_code: Please enter the code you have received to access the workspace.
restricted_workspace.manager_info: As manager you can always access the workspace even if the access conditions are not met.
restricted_workspace.manager_rights_access: Your rights as manager allow you to access to all the features of the workspace.
restricted_workspace.rights_access: Your rights allow you to access some features of the workspace.
restricted_workspace.anonymous_rights_access: The workspace is open to users who are not logged in.
restricted_workspace.not_started: The workspace is not available yet.
restricted_workspace.self_registration: Please register to access the workspace.
restricted_workspace.use_authorized_ip: Please use of the authorized work stations to access the workspace.
restricted_workspace.you_are_manager: You are a manager of the workspace.
restricted_workspace.pending_registration: Your registration request is pending validation.
restricted_workspace.wait_validation: Please wait for a manager to validate your request to access the workspace.
restricted_workspace.archived_help: You can no longer access the content of archived workspaces.

forbidden: Access to the workspace not possible
forbidden_desc: You do not have access to this workspace. Please contact an administrator to give you the necessary rights.
